titles.title: For the relief of Fred Forrest.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 5/2/2000--Introduced. Considers specified periods of military service by Fred Forrest, during which he was on temporary disability leave from active military service as a result of injuries sustained in the Vietnam conflict, as military service for purposes of determining entitlement to and the amount of any Federal civil service retirement annuity.
